DOC.HEADLINE: WEST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : OXNARD ; DEATH_PENALTY SOUGHT IN KILLING
DOC.TEXT: Prosecutors on Wednesday said they will seek the death_penalty against a second defendant in the murder and rape of an Oxnard woman two years ago . Frederick Lee Jackson , 26 , of Oxnard is scheduled to go_on trial in January for the 1992 slaying of Genoveva Gonzales , a mother of four.He faces charges of murder , rape and kidnaping . Jackson ' s co-defendant , Christopher Sattiewhite , was convicted in March of killing Gonzales and sentenced to death . During his trial , prosecutors contended that Jackson repeatedly raped and hit Gonzales in a car while it was driven by Sattiewhite . " This girl was kidnaped , raped and then executed , " said Deputy Dist . Atty . Donald C . Glynn who is prosecuting the case . " It was our theory that he was an aider and abettor to that. " Jackson and Sattiewhite already are serving 28-year sentences for raping a woman on an Oxnard beach in September , 1992 . JULIE FIELDS
